attributes.additional_details:
An amazing young man by the name of Harry Moseley has campaigned to raise money via a website http://www.helpharryhelpothers.com/ , His brave battle has been tough and as of today he is going home, close to journey's end - his twitter is @harry_moseley

If any individual in the UK deserves a Knighthood for his work for charity, courage in the face of overwhelming odds, then it is Harry.  Please HONOUR Harry.
